channel.title: How To Add a Shop In PI
channel.description: How do I add a shop in a PI source? Super Confused! :confused:

item.title: How To Add a Shop In PI
item.dc:creator: @OwnerGriffin OwnerGriffin
item.description:
@OwnerGriffin wrote:

Okay, Jacob_, I just went to actionhandler.java and search that stuff. If I were to make the shops in there, I would have had to spend dungeon points on the shop. unless that means nothing??? I have the shop id and npc spawned, I just need to turn it into a shop? seriously help.

//c.getPA().showInterface(18070); //c.getPA().sendFrame126(""+c.dungPoints+"", 18071); //c.sendMessage("You currently have " + c.dungPoints + " Dungeoneering Points."); break; case 9711: c.getShops().openShop(84); //c.sendMessage("You currently have " + c.dungPoints + " Dungeoneering Points."); break; case 9713: c.getShops().openShop(85); break; case 8000: c.getPA().showInterface(18070); c.getPA().sendFrame126(""+c.dungPoints+"", 18071); c.sendMessage("You currently have " + c.dungPoints + " Dungeoneering Points."); break; case 692: c.getShops().openShop(90); break; case 286: c.getShops().openShop(92);

Read full topic

item.title: How To Add a Shop In PI
item.dc:creator: @OwnerGriffin OwnerGriffin
item.description:
@OwnerGriffin wrote:

[quote=“Jacob_, post:2, topic:442657”]Configure the shop items in data/shops.cfg

The in ActionHandler under the void [tt]firstClickNpc(int)[/tt] add [tt]c.getShops().openShop(#);[/tt]

The # being the number you added inside the shop file before the name. I.E: [tt]shop = #[/tt][/quote]
Do You Got Team Viewer So u Can Do This Ure Explanation To How To Do This Is Bit Hard.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Add a Shop In PI

item.title: How To Add a Shop In PI
item.dc:creator: @Jacob5 Jacob_
item.description:
@Jacob5 wrote:

Configure the shop items in data/shops.cfg

The in ActionHandler under the void [tt]firstClickNpc(int)[/tt] add [tt]c.getShops().openShop(#);[/tt]

The # being the number you added inside the shop file before the name. I.E: [tt]shop = #[/tt]

Read full topic
